TABLE.NAME: mooduell
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the mooduell activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: content
FIELD.COMMENT: Content text

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the quiz this mooduell instance is linked to. Null until quiz is linked to mooduell.

FIELD.NAME: usefullnames
FIELD.COMMENT: Students can't see the full name of their peers (0), They can see the fullname, if Moodle configuration allows it (1)

FIELD.NAME: showcontinuebutton
FIELD.COMMENT: Treat every question as a multi answer question, where we have to press 'continue' to register the answer (1) Register answer of single answer questions directy by pressing the answer button

FIELD.NAME: showcorrectanswer
FIELD.COMMENT: After wrongly answering a querstion, should the right answer by highmarked? (1) Correct answer will not be shown (0)

FIELD.NAME: countdown
FIELD.COMMENT: Set time your students have to answer a question. 0 means no limit.

FIELD.NAME: waitfornextquestion
FIELD.COMMENT: Set time your students can contemplate the correct result. 0 means no limit.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: mooduellid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the MooDuell Instance

FIELD.NAME: playeraid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the player who initiated the game.

FIELD.NAME: playerbid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the player who was challenged to this game

FIELD.NAME: playeratime
FIELD.COMMENT: Do you want to use the countdown and how much time do your students have to answer a question?

FIELD.NAME: playerbtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: playeracorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of correctly answered questions.

FIELD.NAME: playerbcorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of correctly answered questions.

FIELD.NAME: playeraqplayed
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of player A's played questions.

FIELD.NAME: playerbqplayed
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of player B's played questions.

FIELD.NAME: playeraresults
FIELD.COMMENT: The result of the user as string

FIELD.NAME: playerbresults
FIELD.COMMENT: The result of the user as string

FIELD.NAME: winnerid
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: NULL is open game, 1 is player A's turn, 2 is player B's turn, 3 is finished

FIELD.NAME: victorycoefficient
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was created.

TABLE.NAME: mooduell_categories
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores categories from which to chose the random questions of this MooDuell instance.

FIELD.NAME: mooduellid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the MooDuell Instance

FIELD.NAME: category
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of category in the question_categories table

FIELD.NAME: weight
FIELD.COMMENT: Weight of the Questions from 0 to 100. If there are more than one categories linked to one moodle instance, the number of questions from one category are determined by the weight given.

TABLE.NAME: mooduell_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores all the questions linked to this quiz

FIELD.NAME: mooduellid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the MooDuell Instance

FIELD.NAME: gameid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the MooDuell Game

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id question linked to this quiz

FIELD.NAME: playeraanswered
FIELD.COMMENT: Null if not answered, 1 if false, 2 if true

FIELD.NAME: playerbanswered
FIELD.COMMENT: Null if not answered, 1 if false, 2 if true

TABLE.NAME: mooduell_pushtokens
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores all the pushtokens for all the users

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id userid

FIELD.NAME: identifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Device identifier

FIELD.NAME: model
FIELD.COMMENT: Device model

TABLE.NAME: mooduell_highscores
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the highscores and is updated constantly by event 'game_finished'

FIELD.NAME: mooduellid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the MooDuell instance

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The unique user id

FIELD.NAME: ranking
FIELD.COMMENT: The user's rank in the highscores table of the MooDuell instance.

FIELD.NAME: gamesplayed
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of games played (by the user on this instance)

FIELD.NAME: gameswon
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of games won (by user on this instance)

FIELD.NAME: gameslost
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of games lost (by user on this instance)

FIELD.NAME: gamesstarted
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of games started (by the user on the instance)

FIELD.NAME: gamesfinished
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of games finished (by the user on the MooDuell instance)

FIELD.NAME: score
FIELD.COMMENT: The user's score on the MooDuell instance.

FIELD.NAME: qcorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of correctly answered questions (by the user, on the MooDuell instance)

FIELD.NAME: qplayed
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of played questions (by the user on this MooDuell instance)

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was last modified.
